name: Conquer, Dawn
tip: Sight 4 means the first 4 cards (Your AND your opponents) are Visible to you.

name: Prey
tip: If the Prey is removed from the discard pile, the Predator will be worthless.

name: Clear View
tip: Cards that fill the opponentâ€™s hand become better the more you have, since you end up denying the opponent from drawing cards.

name: Enlightenment
tip: Enlightenment comes easiest to the one who knows when to Pass.

name: Balance
tip: Balance works best when you can see if the opponent is out of cards, and you can throw cheap cards after it.

name: Awakening
tip: Awakening pairs nicely with cards that cost nothing, like Child, since you can see if you need to play them or can save them instead.

name: Timid
tip: Triggering Timid's effect lets you keep your cards in rounds that you know you'll lose.

name: Riddle
tip: Return riddle to hand, then play it again to double its points each time.

name: Lantern
tip: Pass whenever you can, and play Lantern as your last card to keep the fire burning.
